name: RSI Momentum Filter
description: RSI > 50 momentum filter with SMA trend confirmation
rationale: RSI > 50 indicates positive momentum - recent gains exceed recent losses. Combined with price > 20 SMA, we get dual confirmation: momentum is positive AND price is in uptrend. This avoids the failed mean-reversion approach (RSI < 30) and instead rides momentum. The 20-day SMA is a short-term trend filter that keeps us in strong moves. This approach works because momentum persists - stocks that are already going up tend to continue going up due to institutional herding and slow information diffusion.
